changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Ajout de nouveay type d'équipement: Addition of new type of equipment
changelog.md.Possibilité d'activer la rotation automa: Possibility of activating the automatic rotation of the API key
changelog.md.Correction de bugs sur le retour d'activ: Fixed bugs on alarm activation feedback
changelog.md.Amélioration du support des thermostats: Improved thermostats support (not coming from the thermostat plugin
changelog.md.Amélioration de la fenetre de configurat: Improvement of the configuration window for Google Smarthome devices
changelog.md.Il faut ABSOLUMENT redemander une synchr: You MUST ABSOLUTELY request equipment synchronization and send the configuration back to the market from Jeedom for the plugin to work
changelog.md.Cette mise à jour est majeur et peux avo: This update is major and may have bugs despite the many tests performed
changelog.md.Nous ferons tout pour les corriger le pl: We will do everything to correct them as quickly as possible
changelog.md.Refonte du plugin pour supporté plus de: Redesign of the plugin to support more types (be careful there may be regressions not seen during the test phase
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis de retour si il y: Correction of a return problem if there is a code for the order and it is bad
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option pour demander à googl: Added option to ask google for confirmation when ordering
changelog.md.Suppression d'un faux message d'erreur l: Suppression of a false error message when saving
changelog.md.Activation par défaut du local home exec: Default activation of local home execution
changelog.md.Passage sur les nouveaux serveurs (mise: Switching to new servers (update required to be able to add / remove new equipment
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la synchronisati: Correction of a bug on equipment synchronization
changelog.md.Amélioration du support des thermostats: Improved support for thermostats (possibility to choose any heating / cold / off command
changelog.md.Préparation du support de la synchronisa: Preparing for synchronization support without cache
changelog.md.Amélioration du support des ventilateur: Improved fan support (on / off now only
changelog.md.Envoi automatique de la configuration au: Automatic sending of the configuration to the market during installation
changelog.md.Ajout d'information sur le status de l'a: Addition of information on the subscription status to voice services
changelog.md.Possibilité d'avoir les informations sur: Possibility of having information on the generic type required when clicking on the NOK label
changelog.md.a partir du 01\/06\/2019 les services vo: from 01/06/2019 the voice services become chargeable, you can see your status on your profile page on the market, tab my services
changelog.md.Inversion de l'inversion des volets (pou: Inversion of the inversion of the panes (to agree with google
changelog.md.support de nouveau type d'équipements: support for new types of equipment
changelog.md.Support des modes sur l'alarme coté Jeed: Support of modes on the alarm on the Jeedom side (not yet working on the Google side
changelog.md.Ajout de l'inversion sur les volets et s: Added inversion on shutters and blinds
changelog.md.Ajout du control de volumes et commande: Addition of volume control and media command (stop, pause, play, next, previous) for the speaker type (requires jeedom 3.3
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis de non désactivat: Correction of a problem of non-deactivation of the transmission when deactivating an equipment
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option pour inverser l'ouver: Add an option to reverse the opening / closing of the shutters
changelog.md.Ajout d'options pour le thermostat: Addition of options for the thermostat
changelog.md.Support d'une confirmation lors d'une ac: Support of a confirmation during an action (attention validation mode is bugged on Google side, code mode works
changelog.md.Ajout des capteurs (ne marche pas encore: Adding sensors (not yet working, no Google listed doc
changelog.md.Ajout des fenêtres (ne marche pas encore: Adding windows (not yet working, no Google listed doc
changelog.md.Ajout des portes (ne marche pas encore,: Adding doors (not yet working, no Google listed doc
changelog.md.Support des volets (attention c'est non: Support of the shutters (attention it is not official on the Google side

index.md.utiliser l'implementation native de Goog: use the native implementation of Google for the management of connected objects
index.md.vous créer les applications en mode dev: you create the applications in dev mode on the Google side then connect your Jeedom to the Google service
index.md.en passant par un service cloud mis à di: via a cloud service provided by Jeedom
index.md.Le mode cloud necessite un abonnement au: Cloud mode requires a subscription to voice services (3 months offered when purchasing the plugin
index.md.GOOGLE impose que votre Jeedom soit acce: GOOGLE requires that your Jeedom be accessible in HTTPS (the plugin does not work in HTTP) with a valid certificate (therefore no self-signed certificate
index.md.Grâce aux Service Pack Power ou Ultimate: Thanks to the Power or Ultimate Service Packs, your Jeedom is accessible via HTTPS
index.md.Si vous disposez d'un Service Pack Commu: If you have a Community Service Pack, you must install yourself an SSL certificate issued by a certification authority (ex
index.md.Le plugin ne supporte pas les équipement: The plugin does not support equipment with dual functions (2 output as certain zwave Fibaro module
index.md.Il faut absolument passer par 2 virtuels: You absolutely have to go through 2 virtual ones to break it down
index.md.Il est important de faire les étapes sui: It is important to do the following steps in the order listed
index.md.Si vous avez un message d'erreur vous in: If you have an error message telling you that your user password or not is not correct you must
index.md.vérifier que Google Home est bien en act: check that Google Home is active on the market
index.md.si c'est bien le cas, etês vous sur de v: if this is the case, be sure of your identifiers (attention you must respect upper / lower case
index.md.si c'est le cas changer votre mot de pas: if this is the case change your password on the market and on the configuration of the voice assistant service (market profiles page tab my services) have it saved
index.md.Après l'installation du plugin, il vous: After installing the plugin, simply go to the configuration of the plugin, select the Cloud mode then click on "Send" (this will send the connection information to the plugin API on the market
index.md.Ensuite dans Jeedom dans Communication\/: Then in Jeedom in Communication / Google Smarthome you must click on save to send your initial configuration, you need at least one device in OK (otherwise when connecting Google Home <-> Jeedom you will get an error
index.md.Ensuite sur l'application Google home il: Then on the Google home application you have to go to the first tab click on Add (the +
index.md.Ensuite dans la liste avec le bouton rec: Then in the list with the search button (magnifying glass at the top right), search for "Jeedom Smarthome" and click on it
index.md.La renseignez vos identifiants market (e: Enter your market identifiers (well those market not those of your Jeedom
index.md.Dans plugin -> communication -> Google S: In plugin -> communication -> Google Smarthome you can configure your different equipment (see chapter Configuration of the plugin
index.md.Pour passer du mode standalone au mode c: To switch from standalone mode to cloud mode you must
index.md.dans le plugin passer en cloud puis sauv: in the plugin go to cloud then save
index.md.dans l'application Google home il faut d: in the Google home application you must dissociate testsmarthome (your standalone application
index.md.dans Communication\/Google Smarthome il: in Communication / Google Smarthome click on save to send your initial configuration
index.md.Lier Jeedom Smarthome dans Google Home: Link Jeedom Smarthome in Google Home
index.md.Toute modification de configuration des: Any modification to the configuration of the equipment sent to Google Home (addition of equipment, deletion of equipment, change of a generic order type) necessarily requires going to Plugin -> Communication -> Googme Smarthome then save
index.md.Google modifiant (très) souvent l'interf: Google modifying (very) often the interface we do not have the human resources to redo all the captures each time
index.md.Il peut donc y avoir de grosse differenc: There can therefore be big differences between the captures and the reality
index.md.Si vous avez utilisé le mode cloud il ne: If you have used cloud mode you should not do this part
index.md.Passer directement au chapitre \"Configu: Go directly to the chapter "Plugin configuration
index.md.Le mode standalone est une \"arnaque\" c: Standalone mode is a "scam" because it makes you create an application at Google in development mode which allows synchronization only for 3 days after activation of test mode
index.md.Il faut donc lors de l'ajout ou modifica: So when adding or modifying equipment, reactivate the test mode every 3 days to be able to synchronize
index.md.Attention on parle bien d'une modificati: Attention we are talking about a modification of the configuration if you do not add or modify equipment there is nothing to do the application will work without time limit
index.md.Etant donné que l'application est une ap: Since the application is a dev application on the Google side, they can cut it, delete it or change the rules at any time
index.md.Dans ce cas Jeedom ne pourra aucunement: In this case Jeedom cannot be held responsible in the event of a malfunction
index.md.Pour que la ou les applications marchent: For the application (s) to work, it is essential that your jeedom is in https with a valid certificate (if you have a service pack, DNS access is there for that
index.md.Pour rappel le plugin permet de: As a reminder, the plugin allows you to
index.md.Il y a donc 2 applications coté Google: There are therefore 2 applications listed on Google
index.md.une pour la partie Google Smarthome et u: one for the Google Smarthome part and one for the interaction part (you can of course do only one of the 2

index.md.Cliquez sur \"Name your Smart Home actio: Click on "Name your Smart Home action
index.md.Mettez \"test smarthome\" et validez (bo: Put "smarthome test" and validate (Save button at the top right
index.md.Ensuite à gauche cliquez sur \"Actions: Then on the left click on "Actions
index.md.Il va falloir donner ici l'url d'arriver: We will have to give here the url to arrive from Jeedom

index.md.Remplissez ensuite les 4 champs en fonct: Then fill in the 4 fields according to the plugin configuration page, then click "Next
index.md.puis \"Authorization URL\" (attention à: then "Authorization URL" (be careful to take the one from the "Smarthome" section
index.md.puis \"Token URL\" (attention à bien pre: then "Token URL" (be careful to take the one from the "Smarthome" section
index.md.Il n'y a rien a faire la simplement \"Ne: There is nothing to do simply "Next
index.md.Il faut maintenant configuré la clef API: Now configure the homegraph API key, for that go
index.md.Si vous n'avez pas de projet il vous fau: If you don't have a project you need to create one
index.md.Cliquez sur homegraphapi puis activez l': Click on homegraphapi then activate the API and click on manage
index.md.Cliquez sur identifiant à gauche: Click on identifier on the left
index.md.Puis sur \"Identifiants des API et servi: Then on "Identifiers of APIs and services
index.md.Cliquez sur \"Créer des identifiants\" p: Click on "Create identifiers" then on "API key

index.md.com\/u\/0\/project\/monprojet-31023\/ove: com / u / 0 / project / myproject-31023 / overview ", the project id is between project / and / overview, in the example here it is" myproject-31023 ", copy this id on the management page the Google Smarthome plugin in "Smarthome Project ID
index.md.Voila vous pouvez maintenant cliquez à g: Here you can now click on the left on "Action
index.md.Il vous faut ensuite sur un smartphone: Then you need on a smartphone
index.md.obligatoirement ne marche pas sur un iph: must not work on an iphone) connect to your Jeedom by
index.md.Il faut ensuite aller dans l'application: Then go to the home application then "configure or add" then "Configure a device" and finally click on "Works with Google" and add your service created above (it starts with [test
index.md.JWT permet de remonter automatiquement t: JWT allows you to automatically report any change in the status of an item of equipment sent to Google, which therefore allows you to have the status more quickly when you request it from Google Home or the Google Home app
index.md.Il n'est pas obligatoire de le configure: It is not compulsory to configure it however if you check the box "Go back to the state" it is absolutely necessary to have done so for it to work
index.md.Pour faire la configuration il faut: To make the configuration you need
index.md.si Google vous le demande il faut choisi: if Google asks you to choose the project (the one created just above
index.md.Cliquer sur créer un compte de service: Click on create a service account
index.md.Lui donner un nom (vous pouvez mettre ce: Give it a name (you can put whatever you want, avoid
index.md.Récuperer le mail généré juste en dessou: Recover the generated email just below to copy it into the configuration of the plugin on Jeedom (fields
index.md.Cliquez sur continuer sans rien modifier: Click on continue without modifying anything
index.md.Ouvrez le fichier téléchargé et copier l: Open the downloaded file and copy the 'private_key' part (starts with "----- BEGIN PRIVATE KEY -----", included and ends with "----- END PRIVATE KEY ----- \ n ", included without") in the configuration of the plugin on Jeedom (fields
index.md.Sur votre Jeedom, allez sur Plugin -> Co: On your Jeedom, go to Plugin -> Communication -> Google Smarthome and in the equipment section select the equipment to be transmitted to Google as well as the type of equipment
index.md.Le plugin se base sur les types génériqu: The plugin is based on the generic Jeedom types of commands to control your home automation
index.md.Il est donc très important de configurer: It is therefore very important to configure these correctly
index.md.Pour le type \"caméra\" vous devez absol: For the "camera" type you must absolutely configure the URL of the stream (we tested only the RTSP) so that it works
index.md.A noter que le support des caméras est p: Note that camera support is currently in beta and consumes a lot of resources
index.md.envoi l'équipement au Google Home pour q: send the equipment to Google Home so that it can control it (please note that the configuration of the generic credits is OK
index.md.envoi toute informations de changement d: send any change of state information to Google directly (this avoids that during a request for information Google Home questions Jeedom
index.md.si en mode code alors Google vous demand: if in code mode then Google will ask you for a Code (the one indicated just below) for each action on the equipment
index.md.indique si la transmission est OK, si c': indicates if the transmission is OK, if it is NOK then it comes from Generic type
index.md.Si vous clicquez sur NOK vous pouvez avo: If you click on NOK you can have the information about the generic type needed
index.md.pseudo de l'équipement, si vide alors c': device nickname, if empty then the device name is used
index.md.Permet la configuration avancé de l'équi: Allows advanced configuration of equipment for Google Home (depends on the type used
index.md.Configuration avancée de l'équipements,: Advanced configuration of equipment, allows access to advanced configuration of commands and therefore to modify generic types
index.md.Permet d'aller directement sur la page d: Allows you to go directly to the equipment configuration page
index.md.Les types d'équipements sont important c: The types of equipment are important this allows Google to react according to the sentences you say
index.md.Jeedom support des types \"beta\" non en: Jeedom support for "beta" types not yet documented at Google so that may or may not work depending on updates at google
index.md.Le type thermostat n'est pleinement supp: The thermostat type is only fully supported through equipment coming from the thermostat plugin, otherwise the management of the modes may not work
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi créer des scènes dans: You can also create scenes in the scene tab, with input and output actions
index.md.Pour lancer un scénario il suffit de dir: To start a scenario just say "Active
index.md.Lors de la sauvegarde Jeedom va automati: When saving Jeedom will automatically request synchronization with Google
index.md.Attention en mode standalone si vous ave: Attention in standalone mode if you have an error (type "Requested entity was not found") try to reactivate the test of the application
index.md.puis de recliquez sur le bouton de conne: then click again on the connection button on the page the plugin configuration page
index.md.Vérifiez aussi la configuration (surtout: Also check the configuration (especially the oauth part) of your google application (sometimes the fields are cleared by Google
index.md.Il ne vous reste plus qu'a faire l'affec: All you have to do is assign the equipment to the rooms in the Google Home app
index.md.Je n'arrive pas à faire l'association en: I can't make the association in cloud mode
index.md.vous etes bien en https (si vous avez un: you are fine in https (if you have a service pack, use jeeodm DNS these are secure by default
index.md.vous avez bien activé Google assistant s: you have activated Google assistant on the market (profile page, tab my services then configuration in the voice assistant section
index.md.vous avez bien souscrit à l'abonnement p: you have subscribed to the voice services subscription and it is still valid (necessary from 01/06/2019
index.md.Cela se voit sur votre page profils du m: This can be seen on your market profiles page, tab my services
index.md.il faut dans plugin -> communication ->: it is necessary in plugin -> communication -> Google Smarthome select "transmit" equipment and set the type and finally save
index.md.si vous etes en certificat let's encrypt: if you are in certificate let's encrypt forget to put the root and the intermediary in the certification chain
index.md.pas de module OK (il en faut obligatoire: no OK module (you must have one otherwise google refuses to link
index.md.si vous etes sur votre propre domaine de: if you are on your own domain having concerns about resolving an ip domain name, no idea why
index.md.Coté jeedom les DNS sont ceux fournis pa: On the jeedom side, the DNS are those provided by default by OVH (we have no control over it anyway
index.md.J'ai même eu le cas d'utilisateur ayant: I even had the case of a user having the DNS at OVH and yet unable to resolve it on our machines
index.md.Probleme avec le téléphone, sur certaine: Problem with the phone, on some brand the browser is either outdated or not chrome by default and it causes problems to make the link
index.md.Si vous avez le soucis encore malgrès ca: If you still have the problem despite this try to send only a light type module
index.md.Les commandes vocales (ainsi que les ret: Voice commands (as well as returns) are managed only by Google, here is the
index.md.L'assistant me demande d'affecter les pi: The assistant asks me to assign the parts but I don't know what the equipment corresponds to
index.md.Oui l'assisant n'affiche pas le nom réel: Yes the assistant does not display the real name of the equipment, just the nickname
index.md.Il faut donc quitter l'assistant et reve: You must therefore quit the assistant and return to the home control home page
index.md.La en cliquant sur l'équipement vous all: By clicking on the equipment you will have its name you can then assign it to a room
index.md.Pourquoi faut-il affecter des pièces à c: Why do you need to assign parts to each piece of equipment
index.md.Car Google ne permet pas de le faire par: Because Google doesn't allow you to do it through the API so you absolutely must do it manually
index.md.J'ai le message d'erreur \"OpenSSL unabl: I get the error message "OpenSSL unable to sign data
index.md.Vous avez du cocher la case \"Pousser l': You have to check the "Push the state" box (in the advanced configuration, green button with the notched wheel) without doing the JWT configuration
index.md.J'ai le message d'erreur \"Cant find res: I get the error message "Cant find resource 404" when saving
index.md.Alors pas de soucis tout est bien sauvé,: So no worries everything is saved, it's just automatic synchronization that is not done
index.md.Pour la faire dites \"Synchroniser mes a: To make it say "Synchronize my devices" to your assistant
index.md.Pour tenter de corriger ce soucis: To try to correct this concern
index.md.Sur cette page vous verrez la liste de t: On this page you will see the list of all projects even those invisible on the google actions page
index.md.Puis refaites le tuto à partir de l'étap: Then redo the tutorial from the step configure the API key Homegraph (activation, generation of key, then dissociate jeedom from your google account and redo the link
index.md.Vous avez un link error ou Impossible de: You have a link error or Unable to update the parameter, check your connection in cloud mode
index.md.Il faut dans jeedom, sur le plugin ajout: It is necessary in jeedom, on the plugin to add equipment, save and redo the association of Jeedom Smarthome in the Google Home application
index.md.J'ai l'erreur \"Apparemment Jeedom Smart: I get the error "Apparently Jeedom Smart Home is unavailable at the moment." or "Sorry I can't connect to Jeedom Smart Home
index.md.Essayez de dé-associé\/ré-associé l'appl: Try to un-associate / re-associate the Google smarthome app
index.md.Attention à bien prendre l'application o: Be careful to take the official application and not a [TEST] application if you have used standalone mode before
index.md.Si le probleme persiste regarder (en par: If the problem persists watch (especially in a scene) that the execution time remains less than 2s (maximum allowed by Google
index.md.Lors de l'ajout des équipement j'ai des: When adding equipment I have NOK
index.md.Cliquez simplement sur le NOK une fenetr: Just click on the NOK a window will tell you the generic type to have on the equipment controls for it to work
index.md.Le changement de vitesse sur un ventilat: Changing the speed on a fan does not work
index.md.Après analyse Google n'envoi pas d'ordre: After analysis Google does not send an order during an action on speed
index.md.Il faut donc attendre que Google corrige: We must therefore wait for Google to correct
